oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Breakfast At The Opry - 1953-04-11 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: 1953-04-11 broadcast of WSM's Breakfast At The Opry, part 1. Personnel include Dave Overton (announcer), Eddie Hill (host), Ernest Tubb (performer), Billy Bird (performer with the Texas Troubadours), Dickie Harris (performer with the Texas Troubadours), Ray Price (guest), and Marty Robbins (guest). Held at the Noel Hotel, Nashville, TN. Sponsored by Rock City. Names of audience members are unconfirmed.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ernest Tubb; Texas Troubadours
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Dave Overton) -- Theme -- Dave Overton introduces Eddie Hill -- Opening statement (Eddie Hill) -- Dave Overton introduces audience member Charles Laden of the 4-H Club -- Eddie Hill and Charles Laden talk -- Dave Overton introduces audience member June James -- Eddie Hill and June James talk -- Eddie Hill introduces Ernest Tubb and the Texas Troubadours -- I Need Attention Bad (Ernest Tubb and the Texas Troubadours) -- Rock City commercial (Dave Overton) -- Eddie Hill talks to members of the audience -- Ernest Tubb talks about servicemen in Korea -- Dave Overton introduces Eddie Hill to audience member Louise Alderdice -- Eddie Hill talks to Louise Alderdice [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Breakfast at the opry (Radio program); Overton, Dave; Hill, Eddie, 1921-1994; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Texas Troubadours; Byrd, Billy; Harris, Dickie (Steel guitarist); Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Robbins, Marty
